00001 <h3><?php echo l("Tag cloud"); ?></h3>
00002 <div id="tag-cloud">
00003 <?php
00004         $tag_factory = new Tag();
00005         
00006         $tags = $tag_factory->find_all(array('order_by' => '`tag` ASC'));
00007 
00008         $max = 0;
00009         
00010         if (count($tags) > 0)
00011         {
00012                 foreach ($tags as $tag)
00013                 {
00014                         $tag->has_and_belongs_to_many('diario_posts');
00015                         //print_r($tag);
00016                 
00017                         $max = max($max, count($tag->diario_posts));
00018                 }
00019         
00020                 foreach ($tags as $tag)
00021                 {
00022                         if (($weight = count($tag->diario_posts)) > 0)
00023                         {
00024                                 $style = 'font-size:' . round(($weight / $max * 16) + 10) . 'px';
00025 ?>
00026         <?php echo $this->link_to($tag->tag, array('action' => 'tag', 'id' => $tag->id, 'style' => $style)); ?>
00027 <?php
00028                         }
00029                 }
00030         }
00031         else
00032         {
00033                 echo em(l('No items'), NULL);
00034         }
00035 ?>
